abilities.desc: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.
abilities.name: Crypt Swarm
abilities.notes: Can hit units up to 1110 range away.

abilities.desc: Fires a projectile that prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.
abilities.name: Silence

abilities.desc: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining health from the enemy.
abilities.name: Spirit Siphon
abilities.notes: Cannot cast multiple on same target.

abilities.desc: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt. Deals 50% damage to buildings. Lasts [35] seconds. Passively grants Movement Speed.
abilities.name: Exorcism
abilities.notes: Spirit damage isn't reduced by damage block abilities.
